text: Zion Silvan Shalom (, born 4 August 1958) is an Israeli politician who was a member of the Knesset for Likud between 1992 and 2015. He held a few big Minister positions, such as the Vice Prime Minister and Minister of the Interior. He resigned on 24 December 2015 following allegations of sexual harassment. Later on, the Attorney-General said these claims were false. == References == Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Likud politicians Category:Tel Aviv University alumni Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Deputy government ministers of Israel
title: Silvan Shalom
